text: "Boyfriend" is a single by Lou Bega from his fourth album Free Again. ==Track listing== ;CD single # "Boyfriend" - 2:51 # "Lucky Punch" - 2:31 ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (2010) !Peak position |- |- |} ==Music video== The music video for "Boyfriend" is directed by Dave Coba and recorded in Berlin in the old Film Noir style. Lou Bega stated that playing a double role in the video “...hasn’t been easy”. title: Boyfriend (Lou Bega song)
